sections.title: Esoteric Knight (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Esoteric Knight class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Esoteric Knight)
sections.description: Grants proficiency with all simple and martial weapons, light armor, medium armor, and shields.

sections.title: Spells per Day (Esoteric Knight)
sections.description: Advances spellcasting in a psychic spellcasting class or kineticist class abilities at specific levels. For kineticists, increases effective level for wild talents, kinetic blast spell level, and burn capacity.

sections.title: Martial Esoterica (Esoteric Knight)
sections.description: Grants bonus combat feats every other level starting at 1st, treating esoteric knight levels as fighter levels for prerequisites. Can exchange the most recent feat by expending spell slots or accepting burn.

sections.title: Psychic Esoterica (Esoteric Knight)
sections.description: Special abilities gained every other level starting at 2nd that enhance combat capabilities. Many require expending spell slots or accepting burn to activate.

sections.title: Battle Mind (Su) (Esoteric Knight)
sections.description: Expend a 1st-level spell slot as a free action to apply metamagic-like benefits to spells or grant archery feats to kinetic blasts.

sections.title: Confounding Projection (Su) (Esoteric Knight)
sections.description: Creates a mental duplicate that grants flanking benefits against a target within 30 feet, even against enemies normally immune to flanking.

sections.title: Eldritch Armor (Su) (Esoteric Knight)
sections.description: Adds Intelligence or Charisma bonus as enhancement bonus to armor or shield, with option to trade enhancement for special abilities like glamered or shadow.

sections.title: Eldritch Weapon (Su) (Esoteric Knight)
sections.description: Temporarily grants weapon special abilities like flaming, frost, or keen, or makes weapons count as cold iron or silver for bypassing damage reduction.

sections.title: Phantom’s Armory (Su) (Esoteric Knight)
sections.description: Makes attacks and armor function as ghost touch for 1 minute, affecting both weapon attacks and kinetic blasts.

sections.title: Shadow Projection (Su) (Esoteric Knight)
sections.description: Summons a phantom ally resembling the esoteric knight that lasts 1 minute per level with no penalty for death or dismissal.

sections.title: Step through Reality (Sp) (Esoteric Knight)
sections.description: Teleports up to 30 feet as dimension door without provoking attacks of opportunity, but cannot bring other creatures.
